docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Recent calls for developing a ''methadone clone'' for cocaine are altogether right. We have a public health emergency on our hands, and there is no prospect of an effective response without some pharmacological treatment.

headline.main: Yes, We Do Need A 'Methadone Clone'

docs.snippet: LEAD: Recent calls for developing a ''methadone clone'' for cocaine are altogether right. We have a public health emergency on our hands, and there is no prospect of an effective response without some pharmacological treatment.

byline.original: By Daniel Patrick Moynihan; Daniel Patrick Moynihan, Democrat of New York, is a member of the Senate Democratic Working Group on Substance Abuse

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Despite wide agreement among New York State lawmakers that Medicaid costs should be curbed, legislators are resisting major elements of the Cuomo administration's plan to cut $350 million in Medicaid spending, illustrating the difficulty of revamping the system.

headline.main: Legislators Resist Cuomo on Medicaid Cuts

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: New York City's child-welfare agency is failing to properly supervise thousands of abused and neglected children who have been placed in foster care with relatives, say caseworkers, union officials and lawyers representing the children.

headline.main: Agency Said to Fail Children Placed in Relatives' Care

docs.snippet: LEAD: New York City's child-welfare agency is failing to properly supervise thousands of abused and neglected children who have been placed in foster care with relatives, say caseworkers, union officials and lawyers representing the children.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A health research group asked the Food and Drug Administration today to stop experiments in which children facing painful medical procedures are given lollipops laced with a powerful narcotic.

headline.main: Group Seeks to Halt Study Of Drug in Form of Lollipop

docs.snippet: LEAD: A health research group asked the Food and Drug Administration today to stop experiments in which children facing painful medical procedures are given lollipops laced with a powerful narcotic.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The birth control industry has changed radically in recent years. Research spending is down and the number of companies offering contraceptive products has fallen off sharply, but the field has been lucrative for those that remain.

headline.main: Birth Control Industry Is Being Transformed

docs.snippet: LEAD: The birth control industry has changed radically in recent years. Research spending is down and the number of companies offering contraceptive products has fallen off sharply, but the field has been lucrative for those that remain.
